name: Provinces
description:
You have a tutoring company and you want to employ tutors but you do not know how many of them do you need. You must hire at least one tutor in the province. A province is a group of directly or indirectly connected cities and no other cities outside of the group (if city a is connected directly with city b, and city b is connected directly with city c, then city a is connected indirectly with city c). If city a is directly connected with city b, then there is direct connection between city b and city a. The standard input will consist of two lines. The first line contains a two integer numbers n(1≤n≤200) and m(1≤m≤500), indicating the number of cities and the second line contains m pairs [i, j] (0≤i,jExample 1
Input:
3 1 0 1
Output: 2

Example 2
Input:
3 2 0 1 1 2
Output: 1

Example 3
Input:
3 0
Output: 3
